full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL RTA MGRIN KYI BSKANG GSO'I CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES DPAL RTA MGRIN KYI BSKANG @010A *, ,GSO'I CHO GA 'DI NI PAndI TA RIN PO CHE DANG RJE DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS MA TSAD PA'I 'DI'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS LA GZHI BLANGS 'DI'I BSKANG GSO YIG RNYING SOGS GZHAN LAS KYANG CUNG ZAD RE RE BLANGS DER BTZUN CHUNG LA TI'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O:) `DGE BA 'DI YIS RIG 'DZIN BDAG CAG GIS, ,'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PA DANG, ,RANG RIG DON GYI RTA MGRIN DBANG GIS RGYAL, ,TSE 'DI NYID LA MNGON DU 'GYUR BAR SHOG (ZHES PA 'DI NI KUN PAndI TA RDO RJE BSOD NAMS MING CAN GYIS BDEN CHE BYANG CHUB GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
